abstract: Russian martial artists are increasingly jumping on bandwagon of enthusiasm for mixed martial arts, drawn by possibility of fame and fortune that comes with entry into Ultimate Fighting Championship in United States.
lead_paragraph: Mixed martial arts is a growing sport in Russia as competitors seek fame and fortune of the Ultimate Fighting Championship, the sport’s most prestigious battleground, a continent away in the United States.

headline.main: Russians Make an Impact on Mixed Martial Arts
headline.print_headline: Russians Are Making an Impact in M.M.A.

snippet: Mixed martial arts is a growing sport in Russia as competitors seek fame and fortune of the Ultimate Fighting Championship, the sport’s most prestigious battleground, a continent away in the United States.
